references.paper_title: Stochastic interpolants: A unifying framework for flows and diffusions
references.reason: This paper provides a general framework for flows and diffusions, which is a foundation for the Geometric Diffusion Bridge proposed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Mace: Higher order equivariant message passing neural networks for fast and accurate force fields
references.reason: This paper introduces Mace, a higher-order equivariant message passing neural network that is highly relevant to the development of equivariant diffusion bridges in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Geometric and physical quantities improve E(3) equivariant message passing
references.reason: This paper improves the accuracy of E(3) equivariant message passing models, which is important for the application of the Geometric Diffusion Bridge framework in different scientific domains.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a fundamental concept for the Geometric Diffusion Bridge framework developed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Equivariant diffusion for molecule generation in 3d
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of equivariant diffusion models for molecule generation, which directly inspired the development of equivariant diffusion bridges in the target paper.
